name: test-all
description: Run tests for all packages in the monorepo
instructions:
Run the test suites for all three packages (server, agent, ui) and provide a summary of results.

1. Run server tests: cd packages/server && uv run pytest --cov=mcp_server --cov-report=term-missing
2. Run agent tests: cd packages/agent && uv run pytest --cov=daily_ai_agent --cov-report=term-missing
3. Run UI type checking: cd packages/ui && npm run typecheck
4. Summarize all results, highlighting any failures
5. If any tests fail, provide suggestions for fixes
